snippet: The official, Heinz Fromm, had been criticized over his office’s handling of an investigation into a neo-Nazi terrorist cell that evaded the authorities for years, killing at least 10 people.
abstract: Heinz Fromm, the head of Germany’s domestic intelligence agency resigns under a shower of criticism over his office’s handling of an investigation into a neo-Nazi terrorist cell that evaded the authorities for years, killing at least 10 people, most of them immigrant businessmen.
lead_paragraph: The official, Heinz Fromm, had been criticized over his office’s handling of an investigation into a neo-Nazi terrorist cell that evaded the authorities for years, killing at least 10 people.

headline.seo: Heinz Fromm Resigns Over National Socialist Underground Inquiry
headline.main: German Intelligence Official Resigns Over Neo-Nazi Inquiry
headline.print_headline: German Intelligence Official Resigns Over Lapses in Neo-Nazi Investigation
